class.artificer:
By {@level}, you have studied the workings of magic and how to channel it through objects.
As a result, you have gained the ability to cast spells.
To observers, you don't appear to be casting spells in a conventional way; you look as if you're producing wonders using mundane items or outlandish inventions
class.bard:
You have learned to untangle and reshape the fabric of reality in harmony with your wishes and music.
Your spells are part of your vast repertoire, magic that you can tune to different situations
class.cleric: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast spells
class.druid: Drawing on the divine essence of nature itself, you can cast spells to shape that essence to your will
class.mystic:
As a student of psionics, you can master and use psionic talents and disciplines.
Your knowledge allows you to cast spells
class.paladin: By {@level}, you have learned to draw on divine magic through meditation and prayer to cast spells as a cleric does
class.ranger: By the time you reach {@level}, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does
class.sorcerer:
An event in your past, or in the life of a parent or ancestor, left an indelible mark on you, infusing you with arcane magic.
This font of magic, whatever its origin, fuels your spells
class.warlock: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron have given you facility with spells
class.wizard: As a student of arcane magic, you have a spellbook containing the research that shows the first glimmerings of your true power
class.arcane-trickster: When you reach {@level}, you gain the ability to cast spells
class.eldritch-knight: When you reach {@level}, you augment your martial prowess with the ability to cast spells
class.four-elements: At {@level}, you learn magical disciplines that harness the power of the four elements, allowing you to cast spells
class.totem-warrior: Yours is a path that seeks emotional attunement with the natural world, granting you a limited capacity to cast spells

class.artificer: Your understanding of the theory behind magic allows you to wield these spells with superior skill
class.bard: Your magic comes from the heart and soul you pour into the performance of your music or oration
class.cleric: The power of your spells comes from your devotion to your deity
class.druid: Your magic draws upon your devotion and attunement to nature
class.mystic: Your power comes from your ability to calculate new realities
class.paladin: Their power derives from the strength of your convictions
class.ranger: Their power draws on your attunement to nature
class.sorcerer: The power of your magic relies on your ability to project your will into the world
class.warlock: This magic is powered by your comprehension of weird magical secrets
class.wizard: You learn your spells through dedicated study and memorization
class.arcane-trickster: You learn your spells through dedicated study and memorization
class.eldritch-knight: You learn your spells through dedicated study and memorization
class.four-elements: Your spells are an extention of your ki
class.totem-warrior: Their power derives from the depth of your empathy

class.artificer: marrying technology and magic into a miraculous invention through careful study and hard work
class.bard: drafting and rehearsing a powerful artisanal twist, then adding a flare of your brilliant magic
class.cleric: an intensive period of symbolic interaction with the powers that be, such as prayer, prose, and sacrifice
class.druid: becoming one with the nature through meditation and introspection, and wielding the powerful mana found in that connection
class.mystic: contemplating deeply on hypothetical scenarios; attempting to manifest power by escorting those thoughts into reality
class.paladin: triggering divine inspiration by actively supporting the ideals that you preach—through practical action
class.ranger: scavenging for mystical components and utilities in the environments around you, and using them to commune with nature
class.sorcerer: focusing your energies on gemstones and other conduits of magic until you discover something new
class.warlock: soliciting your patron for secrets, researching your discoveries, and testing them with arcane equipment
class.wizard: research and development—involving reading, taking notes, and understanding magical formulae
class.arcane-trickster: research and development—involving reading, taking notes, and understanding magical formulae
class.eldritch-knight: research and development—involving reading, taking notes, and understanding magical formulae
class.four-elements: entering a deep and profound state of meditation, underscored by repetitive practice of the spell's form
class.totem-warrior: finding tranquility; channeling your most earnest emotions of grief and forgiveness into the mana around you

class.mystic: in a state of superactive thought
class.ranger: energizing objects from nature with mana

class.artificer: the fine inks, mechanical parts, and magical components that you need throughout the process
class.bard: the luxuries that help you get into the mindset of creation, such as fine food and fabulous costumes
class.cleric: the expensive ceremonies that you participate in, and the fine candles and incenses that are consumed by the process
class.druid: the rare herbal remedies you consume to help you ease into your deep, spiritual connections with the natural world
class.mystic: focal points, such as gemstones, that you spend to heighten the depth of your thoughts and calculate potential realities
class.paladin: the costs of various activities that you perform to uphold your ideals, such as donating to various organizations and sponsoring public events
class.ranger: the rare plants and materials that you use to channel the natural magics around you and learn of its wonders
class.sorcerer: gemstones and other magical oddities that you use for expirementation, trying to find an extention of your power
class.warlock: the magical objects you spend to communicate with your patron, and the costly research materials that are suggested to you
class.wizard: the fine inks and paper that you use to take notes and record arcane sigils, and the various magical components used in your research
class.arcane-trickster: the textbooks and materials needed to learn about the spell
class.eldritch-knight: the textbooks and materials needed to learn about the spell
class.four-elements: the research materials, herbal remedies, and personal training needed to learn the spell
class.totem-warrior: the herbal remedies and spiritual components needed to learn the spell

class.artificer: transcribing its description, drafting blueprints for its apparatus, and illustrating its arcane sigils—using a notation that is unique to you
class.wizard: transcribing its description and casting instructions, and illustrating its arcane designs and sigils—using a notation that is unique to you

class.artificer: the fine inks you need to record the spell
class.wizard: the fine inks you need to record the spell

class.artificer: the miscellaneous gadgets needed to craft a proof-of-concept for the spell
class.wizard: the magical oddities necessary to practice the underlying form of the spell
